# Issue Templates

GitHub issue templates for standardized bug reports, feature requests, documentation issues, and questions.

## Contents

| Path                 | Description                                         |
| -------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| `bug_report.md`      | Template for reporting bugs with reproduction steps |
| `feature_request.md` | Template for proposing new features                 |
| `documentation.md`   | Template for documentation issues and improvements  |
| `question.md`        | Template for asking questions about the project     |

## Overview

These templates appear when creating new issues on GitHub, guiding contributors to provide necessary information. Each template includes YAML frontmatter that sets the title prefix and labels automatically.
